name: Inspector Gadget: MAD Robots Invasion
summary: Dr. Claw continues his quest for world domination. He dreams of a world completely ruled by his super-powerful robots that are indestructible and fitted with highly advanced artificial intelligence!. To carry on his plan without interference, Dr. Claw has to first kidnap Penny and Brain to diver the attentions of Inspector Gadget. Now it is up to you! Become Inspector Gadget, free your friends and save the world from Dr. Claws evil clutches.
